---
title: "Hands-on Exe00 : Working with tidyverse"
author: "Shivam Tripathi"
date-modified: "last-modified"
execute:
  echo: true
  eval: true
  warning: false
  freeze: true
---



## Getting started

Loading tidyverse onto r enivironmnet by using the code chunk below.



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse)
```
:::



## Importing data

Code chunk below uses read_csv() of readr to import REALIS2019.csv into r enviroment as a tribale data. frame.



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
realis2019 <- read_csv("data/REALIS2019.csv")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
realis2019
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A tibble: 19,515 × 20
   `Project Name`           Address   `No. of Units` `Area (sqm)` `Type of Area`
   <chr>                    <chr>              <dbl>        <dbl> <chr>         
 1 PEIRCE VIEW              557 Uppe…              1          113 Strata        
 2 FLORIDA PARK             54 Sunri…              1          312 Land          
 3 BULLION PARK             164 Lent…              1           75 Strata        
 4 CASTLE GREEN             483 Yio …              1          107 Strata        
 5 HAPPY ESTATE             36 Thoms…              1          687 Land          
 6 TEACHER'S HOUSING ESTATE 148 Tago…              1          228 Land          
 7 THE PANORAMA             20 Ang M…              1           94 Strata        
 8 THE PANORAMA             16 Ang M…              1           42 Strata        
 9 CHIP THYE GARDEN         8 Yio Ch…              1          207 Land          
10 TEACHER'S HOUSING ESTATE 16 Kalid…              1          232 Land          
# ℹ 19,505 more rows
# ℹ 15 more variables: `Transacted Price ($)` <dbl>, `Nett Price($)` <chr>,
#   `Unit Price ($ psm)` <dbl>, `Unit Price ($ psf)` <dbl>, `Sale Date` <chr>,
#   `Property Type` <chr>, Tenure <chr>, `Completion Date` <chr>,
#   `Type of Sale` <chr>, `Purchaser Address Indicator` <chr>,
#   `Postal District` <dbl>, `Postal Sector` <dbl>, `Postal Code` <dbl>,
#   `Planning Region` <chr>, `Planning Area` <chr>
```


:::
:::



## Pivoting data



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# eval: FALSE
popdata_fat <- read_csv("data/PopData2019_fat.csv")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# eval: FALSE
popdata_long <- popdata_fat %>%
  pivot_longer(c(3:21),
               names_to = "Age Group",
               values_to = "Population")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
write_rds(popdata_long, "rds/popdata_long.rds")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
popdata_long <- read_rds("rds/popdata_long.rds")
```
:::



## Working with dplyr



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
realis2019_selected <- realis2019 %>%
  select(`Project Name`,
         `Transacted Price ($)`,
         `Property Type`)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
realis2019_selected <- realis2019 %>%
  select(-`Address`, -`Unit Price ($ psf)`,
         -`Nett Price($)`, -`Completion Date`,
         -`Tenure`)
realis2019_selected
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A tibble: 19,515 × 15
   `Project Name`           `No. of Units` `Area (sqm)` `Type of Area`
   <chr>                             <dbl>        <dbl> <chr>         
 1 PEIRCE VIEW                           1          113 Strata        
 2 FLORIDA PARK                          1          312 Land          
 3 BULLION PARK                          1           75 Strata        
 4 CASTLE GREEN                          1          107 Strata        
 5 HAPPY ESTATE                          1          687 Land          
 6 TEACHER'S HOUSING ESTATE              1          228 Land          
 7 THE PANORAMA                          1           94 Strata        
 8 THE PANORAMA                          1           42 Strata        
 9 CHIP THYE GARDEN                      1          207 Land          
10 TEACHER'S HOUSING ESTATE              1          232 Land          
# ℹ 19,505 more rows
# ℹ 11 more variables: `Transacted Price ($)` <dbl>,
#   `Unit Price ($ psm)` <dbl>, `Sale Date` <chr>, `Property Type` <chr>,
#   `Type of Sale` <chr>, `Purchaser Address Indicator` <chr>,
#   `Postal District` <dbl>, `Postal Sector` <dbl>, `Postal Code` <dbl>,
#   `Planning Region` <chr>, `Planning Area` <chr>
```


:::
:::



## Working with filter() of dplyr



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
realis2019_filtered <- realis2019_selected %>%
  filter(`Property Type` == "Condominium" |
         `Property Type` == "Apartment") %>%
  filter(`Type of Sale` == "New Sale") %>%
  filter(`Unit Price ($ psm)` <= 13000)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
realis2019_end <- realis2019 %>%
  select(`Project Name`,
         `Transacted Price ($)`,
         `Type of Sale`,
         `Unit Price ($ psm)`,
         `Property Type`) %>%
  filter(`Property Type` == "Condominium" |
           `Property Type` == "Apartment") %>%
  filter(`Type of Sale` == "New Sale") %>%
  filter(`Unit Price ($ psm)` <= 13000)
realis2019_end
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A tibble: 87 × 5
   `Project Name`     `Transacted Price ($)` `Type of Sale` `Unit Price ($ psm)`
```
